reasoning: Diabetic nephropathy develops in approximately 20-40% of diabetic patients over their lifetime. With global diabetes prevalence ~6% in 2005 and estimated 2-3% annual incidence among diabetics, overall population incidence ~8.5 per 100k person-years.
source: Molitch ME et al. (2004). Nephropathy in diabetes. Diabetes Care. 27(suppl 1):S79-S83
